Name: Rock Cannon
Desc: Moves 1 block each time. Effective against multiple targets.

Name: Black Blade
Desc: Moves up to 2 blocks each time. Gains a bonus round upon hitting an enemy. Effective against single targets.

Name: Oblivion
Desc: Moves 1 block each time. Effective against multiple targets.

Name: Crimson Weave
Desc: Moves up to 2 blocks each time. Effective against single targets.

Name: Ordinary Form
Desc: <color=#FFD584>Movement Range: 2 squares</color>. Attacks the enemy to accumulate <color=#FFD584>Rage</color> and enter the <color=#FFD584>Soulflame Form</color>.

Name: Soulflame Form
Desc: Accumulate more than <color=#FFD584>50 Rage</color> to unlock the <color=#FFD584>Soulflame Form</color> with <color=#FFD584>7 squares as the Movement Range instead</color>. <color=#FFD584>Spend Rage</color> to enhance skill effects.

Name: White
Desc: In White Form, can move to <color=#FFD584>any white square</color> <color=#FFD584>away from</color> Vera. Casts [White Shark Thunderstrike] during the next turn if hasn't taken any damage by the end of the ongoing turn.

Name: Black
Desc: In Black Form, can move to <color=#FFD584>any black square</color> and <color=#FFD584>pursue</color> Vera.
